location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Draft circular letter from Colonel Lewis Pelly, Mount Aboo [Ābu] to Colonel William Beynon, Jeypore [Jaipur]; Colonel Alexander Hutchinson, Meywar [Mewār]; Colonel William Carnell, Erinpoora [Erinpura]; Major Charles Walter, Jodhpoor [Jodhpur]; Captain Arthur Roberts, Eastern States, Bhurtpoor [Bharatpur]; Captain James Berkeley, Harrowlee [Haroli] - Deolee [Deoli].

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a note from Charles Umpherston Aitchison regarding Rajpootana [Rājasthān] carriages (the note is no longer enclosed).
